text: Mba maan mɨn thugim, Zudaiŋ mbari wari fugap, Por shogirim, ana rɨmɨnga kama shogi. Mbe kama havhara nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza guigira nzuai, kha vun ki Fhe Bakɨme nza kaŋgi, nza guigira Por shogirim, ana rimgirga, nza ntigem gura mban mbegɨrga fhu. Nza Por shogirim, ana rimgirga, nza za mban mbɨrga.”
